message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.DL 

The paper discusses the use of a Controlled Natural Language (CNL) in a popular book, which is relevant to the fields of computational linguistics (cs.CL) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The analysis of word production rules and distributions also suggests a potential application of machine learning (cs.LG) and deep learning (cs.DL) techniques. Additionally, the focus on using drawn pictures to explain complex concepts may have implications for human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
